desc.zh_tw: 老師收到了遊戲開發部的信件，並從中得知了遊戲開發部將要被廢社的消息；彩奈順便介紹了一些千年學院的概況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。

desc.en: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.

desc.ko: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_tw: 研討會的會計優香，打算以遊戲開發部實績不佳為由關閉社團。綠和桃井為了反抗優香，便前往<廢墟>尋找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.

desc.zh_tw: 優香前來解釋情況，表示廢社是板上釘釘的事情。桃井與綠據理力爭，但反遭優香冷嘲熱諷了一下社團的唯一成果——“年度垃圾遊戲排行榜第一名”的《故事·傳說·編年史》。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.

desc.zh_tw: 就在優香讓兩人將東西全部清走，並稱它們為“亂七八糟的東西”時，桃井突然聲稱他們一定能在“千年大賞”上拿出成果、斬獲名次——但時間只有兩週。優香最後同意。

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在廢棄工廠遇到長得像人類的機器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井為了阻止遊戲開發部被廢社，於是便把愛麗絲帶到社團活動室，打算讓她成為社團成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑進了工廠裡，發現機器人不再跟隨。就在這時，設施裡的系統開始識別三人身份，並認出了老師，給三人發放了通行權限。三人從地板打開的門掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在廢墟的一個天坑里發現了睡著著的愛麗絲，發現了“AL-1S”之類的字樣。綠可憐愛麗絲，便決定將她帶回千年，還給她穿上了自己的衣服。就在這時，愛麗絲因與老師接觸而醒了過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井將愛麗絲帶回到社團活動室，綠非常驚詫。愛麗絲因為不懂，開始亂動社團的東西，比如把手柄和遊戲機塞進嘴里之類。桃井隨後說出了自己的計劃：她想讓愛麗絲偽裝成千年的學生加入社團，解決人數不夠被廢社的問題。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.

desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲玩遊戲開發部學生推薦的遊戲玩了一整晚，已經學會人類說話的口吻了。桃井遞給愛麗絲各種能偽裝成千年學園學生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。

desc.en: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.

desc.zh_tw: 柚子重新向愛麗絲介紹了自己，並想要為愛麗絲推薦RPG遊戲，結果話一出口三人就吵了起來。愛麗絲日夜不停地打著遊戲，以超乎常人的速度通關了一部又一部。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.

desc.zh_tw: 優香為了審查新成員的資格而來到遊戲開發部,於是愛麗 絲便與綠及桃井一起練習自我介紹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。

desc.en: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井自信地認為愛麗絲能夠通過優香的資格審查，而綠則對此仍有顧慮。桃井於是測試愛麗絲的能力，但仍然不很盡人意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。

desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 經過幾輪問答後，優香同意讓愛麗絲成為正式成員。但她威脅說，如果還是做不出好遊戲就會關閉遊戲開發部。遊戲開發部全員再次前往廢墟尋找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.

Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然說話很奇怪，但優香業已感受到愛麗絲對遊戲的熱愛，由此承認了她是遊戲開發部的一員。然而優香表示，由於規定突然變更，若月底拿不出成績，無論什麼社團都會被廢除。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: 优香走后，柚子从柜子里出来，表示要前往废墟找到《G.Bible》一书。她同意桃井和绿两人的想法，想要一起保护社团。After Yuuka left, Yuzu got out of her wardrobe, stating that she would like to go to the Ruins to find the book G.Bible. She agreed the idea of protecting the club together purposed by Momoi and Midori.
